361 U.S. 6

80 S.Ct. 90

4 L.Ed.2d 52

Cornelius NICHOLS
v.
Richard A. McGEE, etc., et al.

No. 16, Misc.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 12, 1959

Cornelius Nichols, pro se.

Stanley Mosk, Atty. Gen. of California, and Doris H. Maier, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellees.

PER CURIAM.

1

The appeal is dismissed.
